00032 #ifndef __LWIP_ERR_H__
00033 #define __LWIP_ERR_H__
00034 
00035 #include "lwip/opt.h"
00036 
00037 #include "arch/cc.h"
00038 
00039 typedef s8_t err_t;
00040 
00041 /* Definitions for error constants. */
00042 
00043 #define ERR_OK    0      /* No error, everything OK. */
00044 #define ERR_MEM  -1      /* Out of memory error.     */
00045 #define ERR_BUF  -2      /* Buffer error.            */
00046 
00047 
00048 #define ERR_ABRT -3      /* Connection aborted.      */
00049 #define ERR_RST  -4      /* Connection reset.        */
00050 #define ERR_CLSD -5      /* Connection closed.       */
00051 #define ERR_CONN -6      /* Not connected.           */
00052 
00053 #define ERR_VAL  -7      /* Illegal value.           */
00054 
00055 #define ERR_ARG  -8      /* Illegal argument.        */
00056 
00057 #define ERR_RTE  -9      /* Routing problem.         */
00058 
00059 #define ERR_USE  -10     /* Address in use.          */
00060 
00061 #define ERR_IF   -11     /* Low-level netif error    */
00062 
00063 
00064 #ifdef LWIP_DEBUG
00065 extern char *lwip_strerr(err_t err);
00066 #else
00067 #define lwip_strerr(x) ""
00068 #endif /* LWIP_DEBUG */
00069 #endif /* __LWIP_ERR_H__ */
